info.title: Microsoft Mission
info.description: Microsoft Mission Resource Provider management API.

get.description: List the operations for the provider
List CatalogResource resources by subscription ID
List CommunityResource resources by subscription ID
Lists all of the internal connections in the specified subscription.
List EnclaveResource resources by subscription ID
List WorkloadResource resources by subscription ID

connectionType.description:
Specifies the type of internal connection. 
 Possible values are:
 PrivateLink 
 NetworkSecurityGroup
